ing: 2 tablespoons hot Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank'sÂ® REDHOT Buffalo Wing Sauce)
des: "I came up with this recipe to serve with chicken fingers. I was tired of honey mustard, but didn't want all of the heat of straight Buffalo sauce. Here's my creamy and slightly sweet version that is a perfect dipper for anything from chicken fingers to fried shrimp!"
ins: Whisk mayonnaise, Buffalo wing sauce, and honey together in a bowl until smooth.
